name: katriel cohn-gordon
body:
Hi, I'm [Katriel](http://gravatar.com/avatar/e5512bf7cf0dc6ec1b18072e2581c2ba?s=600).

I **study** security protocols, particularly definitions of security and their formal study. I am a member of the Oxford [Cyber Security CDT](https://www2.cybersecurity.ox.ac.uk/cdt/), and [Cas Cremers](http://www.cs.ox.ac.uk/people/cas.cremers/) is my DPhil supervisor.

I occasionally **post** [long-form](http://blog.katriel.co.uk/) and [short-form](http://posts.katriel.co.uk/) things.

You can find me on many **other websites**: coding ([StackOverflow](http://stackoverflow.com/users/398968/katrielalex), @katrielalex), social ([Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/katrielalex), [MetaFilter](https://www.metafilter.com/user/67252), [LinkedIn](http://uk.linkedin.com/in/katrielalex)) and musical (currently just [Spotify](http://open.spotify.com/user/katrielalex)).

**Contact me** via [email](http://www.google.com/recaptcha/mailhide/d?k=01xRgVM8ulRDgA3TgDCclMYg==&c=WgBh2UDv-jOR9918qmHtJZ1g4jzIkL58J2glt683yS8=).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
